summary.title: WebApp Threat Model
summary.description: A three-tier web application for managing users and records. End-users access the User Interface (Browser) over HTTPS, which sends requests to the Web Application (API server). The API performs authentication/authorization, input validation, and business logic, and then queries the Database over a private network. Primary assets include user identities, session tokens, and PII stored at rest. Trust boundaries exist between Browser↔API (internet) and API↔DB (internal network). The model assumes TLS is enforced, secrets are stored in a vault, and least-privilege roles are applied. Out of scope: third-party identity providers’ internal risks.

threats.title: UI Credential Stuffing
threats.description: Attacker reuses leaked credentials to impersonate a user.
threats.mitigation: Enforce MFA; rate-limit login; use reCAPTCHA/Turnstile; breached-password checks; lockouts with back-off.

threats.title: Denied Actions Without Audit
threats.description: Users can deny risky actions if no immutable log exists.
threats.mitigation: Append-only audit logs with user ID, IP, UA, request ID; signed/time-stamped; CloudWatch retention.

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Stolen/Forgered Session Token
threats.description: Attacker uses a valid JWT/cookie to impersonate.
threats.mitigation: Rotate/short-TTL tokens; bind to device/IP risk signals; revoke on logout; HttpOnly+Secure cookies; token audience/issuer checks.

threats.title: SQL Injection on API Parameters
threats.description: Unsanitized inputs reaching DB queries.
threats.mitigation: Parameterized queries/ORM; centralized validation; WAF SQLi rules; least-priv DB role.

threats.title: Missing Request Correlation
threats.description: Inability to tie a change to a user/time/request across services.
threats.mitigation: Correlation IDs; structured JSON logs; CloudWatch + retention + immutable sink (S3 w/ object lock).

threats.title: Sensitive Data in Logs
threats.description: API logs may include secrets, tokens, PII.
threats.mitigation: Log scrubbing; blocklists for secrets; privacy review; least-priv log access.

threats.title: App-Level DoS (Expensive Queries)
threats.description: Crafted inputs trigger heavy DB/CPU work.
threats.mitigation: Per-endpoint quotas; circuit breakers; pagination; query timeouts.

threats.title: Insecure Deserialization / RCE
threats.description: Unsafe JSON/XML/object parsing leading to code execution.
threats.mitigation: Strict content-types; safe parsers; disable polymorphic types; dependency scanning (Trivy/Clair).

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Data Tampering at Rest
threats.description: Unauthenticated writes or unapproved schema changes.
threats.mitigation: AES-256 encryption at rest; change control; migrations; row-level security; least-privilege.

threats.title: Privilege Creep in DB Accounts
threats.description: Roles gain extra grants over time.
threats.mitigation: Role reviews; least privilege; automated drift detection; break-glass account with MFA.

threats.title: Resource Exhaustion (Locks/Connections)
threats.description: Exhaust connection pool / long-running transactions.
threats.mitigation: Connection pooling; max query time; kill long transactions; read replicas; autoscaling.

threats.title: No Immutable Audit Trail
threats.description: Updates not traceable to request/user.
threats.mitigation: DB audit logs → S3 (object lock); CloudWatch trails; change data capture.

threats.title: PII Leakage via Backups
threats.description: Backups/snapshots stored without encryption or access control.
threats.mitigation: Encrypted backups; KMS; restricted roles; lifecycle policies; off-site tests.

threats.title: Resource Exhaustion (Locks/Connections)
threats.description: Exhaust connection pool / long-running transactions.
threats.mitigation: Connection pooling; max query time; kill long transactions; read replicas; autoscaling.
